summary: Integration test suite that validates the end-to-end functionality of the SeamlessM4T v2 multilingual model across speech and text modalities, ensuring correct translation between languages and formats.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable multilingual translation performance for the product by automatically detecting regressions and confirming that speech‑to‑speech, speech‑to‑text, text‑to‑speech, and text‑to‑text conversions work as expected across supported languages.
